data.title: Into the Woods
data.meta_description: Into the Woods is coming to BroadwaySF at the Curran Theater in San Francisco, California. Buy tickets from the Official Box Office.
data.text:
ONE WEEK ONLY! SPECIAL ENGAGEMENT COMING TO SAN FRANCISCO

Here’s a reason to be happy ever after...

Direct from Broadway, the critically acclaimed and much beloved production of Stephen Sondheim and James Lapine’s Tony®-winning triumph is coming to San Francisco with its Broadway stars to boot. INTO THE WOODS features Montego Glover as The Witch, Stephanie J. Block as The Baker’s Wife, Sebastian Arcelus as The Baker, and Gavin Creel as Cinderella’s Prince/Wolf – all reprising their Broadway roles – in a production called “radiant” (Variety), “enchanting” (The Wall Street Journal), and “a priceless revival with a perfect cast” (The Washington Post). Directed by Lear deBessonet (Hercules), this theatrical event honors Sondheim’s legendary memory and his Broadway masterpiece like never before.

“Should you go? Of course you should!” (The New York Times).

AGES & ADVISORIES: Recommended for ages 8+. No children under 5 allowed.
